description:
PART 1

PLC Course #1: Basic PLC Course Using RS Logix 5000.

Course Overview

1. What is a PLC?
2. The numbering systems.
3. Logic Gates
4. Applying Programming Strategies and Techniques using RS Logix 5000.
5. Getting Started with RS Logix 5000
6. Documenting and Searching Ladder Logix using RS Logix 5000 Program.
7. Programming Timer and Counter Instruction using RS Logix 5000.
8. Drafting Ladder Logic for an RS Logix 5000 Project.



PLC - programmable logic controller training

RS Logix 500 an Allen Bradley software solution to programming PLC's

Sections and topics from the computer science section of the EIT (Engineering In Training) exam will be covered while learning how to program PLC's

Training Rockwell Automation

RSLogix 500 PLC Training Video

SLC-500 Automation training

RSLogix 500 and SLC-500 training

Online PLC Training - PLC Training Courses

RSLogix 500 tutorials

RSLogix 500 training

PLC Programming with RSLogix 500
title: Programmable Logic Controller RSLogix 500 (2 PDH's for PE's)
